comments.body:
Please consider using a release tarball from Github instead of a git tag:

e.g.: `url: https://github.com/EconForge/interpolation.py/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz`
We try to standardize the license as much as possible. So please change this to `BSD 2-Clause` (it can be done later in the feedstock).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +36,40 @@about:
  home: https://github.com/econforge/interpolation.py
  license: BSD-2
  summary: 'Interpolation in Python'
